oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Agribio I: Farming systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Farming Systems
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The main objective of this part of the program (1 project) is to be able to propose organic farming cultural pratices of winter wheat which allow to minimize the contamination by mycotoxins and the associated medical risk.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: { Programme part} Agribio I: Farming systems. Runs 2001 - 2003. Programme Leader(s): Dor√©, Thierry.
